name: .NOTES File Extension
summary: Learn about .NOTES files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Text file that stores electronic post-it notes created with Memento; used for creating simple reminders, such as dates and times of events; appears on the computer's desktop as a visual reminder.

content: The Notes file is named "Memento.notes" and is saved in the "My Documents" folder by default.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
